content: designed using caron cotton lava cakes this lovely crochet shawl is worked with a striped repeat to create a wonderful faded effect thanks to the yarn striping is a cinch on this pattern that uses the granny stitch to bring out the lovely tones pick a shade that coordinates perfectly with your wardrobe or give it as a please-anyone gift finished with a generous fringe and a tassel it s a breezy choice for warmer months
